Summary: Oscillating "UFO" Lights Witnessed in the Sky Over Westerville OH 12-12-2012
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Westerville
There were no other sightings in Westerville on or around December 12th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailson the evening of 12-12-2012, beginning at approximately 7:25pm, i witnessed what appeared to be an aircraft with its landing lights on, approaching from the e-se, headed n-nw. the craft was traveling at a speed that you would associate with an airplane, only the lights were very bright, which made me notice it, and lights that were orange-ish in color. i had stopped my car that i was traveling in to watch the craft at this point, which i could see very clearly now, as there are no street lights in my neighborhood, and i have 20\15 vision. as the craft approached, i could see that it was now actually a group of tightly arranged lights that appeared pyramidal in shape, and the lights were a combination of bright orange and yellow. i immediately reached for my motorola droid razr hd and began filming in "hd" mode, under normal magnification. the craft had come to a "complete stop" at this point and was now oscillating in distinctly different colors: red, blue, green, orange and yellow about 6 seconds into the video i zoomed in at approximately 75% magnification, in an attempt to get better detail of what i was witnessing and observing. i would estimate that my distance from the object was approximately 1\2 mile. at 20 seconds into the video taping of the craft, it "blinked" a couple of times and vanished. i continued taping, adding details to the video to corroborate the time and date of what i had just observed, along with other identifying information.
